argSrc: The universities in Germany should not under any circumstances charge tuition fees.
argTrg: This would impede or prevent access to those who are financially weaker.

argSrc: The universities in Germany should not under any circumstances charge tuition fees.
argTrg: The anticipated objectives of tuition fees can be achieved by other means.

argSrc: The universities in Germany should not under any circumstances charge tuition fees.
argTrg: And funding-wise it ought to be considered how costs incurred by students from other (federal) states can be reimbursed.
